mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon(price, pid, uid, build_time, end_time, max_price, status) VALUES (#{price}, #{pid}, #{uid}, #{build_time}, #{end_time}, #{max_price})
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET price = #{price}, price = #{price}, pid = #{pid}, uid = #{uid}, build_time = #{build_time}, end_time = #{end_time}, max_price = #{max_price}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
